title: Formative Practice for the FRQ 3 - Non-syllabus Part A

content.question: Answer the following question(s) in English unless the question specifically asks you to provide Latin words. Identify one and only one of Trajan’s actions that exemplifies his friendliness, as described in lines 1-3 (Romae...habuissent). Provide the Latin word(s) that support your answer in Part (i). Translate in context the Latin word(s) you cited in Part (ii).

frqParts.text: Answer the following question(s) in English unless the question specifically asks you to provide Latin words. Identify one and only one of Trajan’s actions that exemplifies his friendliness, as described in lines 1-3 (Romae...habuissent). Provide the Latin word(s) that support your answer in Part (i). Translate in context the Latin word(s) you cited in Part (ii).
